name: Save Shiba!
description:
In this game you change magnets polarity to save shibe.

You can change the polarity of metal blocks by clicking on them.

You can also repel blocks by changing the polarity of solid blocks.

You can make shiba sit by clicking on them.

Dog has long legs so it can walk over 1 block gaps.

Magnets can only attract itself to the very grey blocks in the game.
The game is best played standalone via download.
Standalone version will allow you to reset a level if you get stuck. 

This is a game made by Lascif and BoltactionToaster lascif.itch.io/ boltactiontoaster.itch.io/

Credit for Music - https://opengameart.org/content/bossa-nova
